data.comment: QPR's Osman Kakay has been booked in Bournemouth.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
In the minute 45, Bright Osayi-Samuel (QPR) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 48, Diego Rico Salguero (Bournemouth) has received a yellow card from John Brooks.
Ilias Chair for QPR has been booked by John Brooks and receives a first yellow card.
Arnaut Danjuma is on a sub for Sam Surridge for Bournemouth.
In the minute 67, The away team replace Bright Osayi-Samuel with Albert Adomah.
QPR make their second substitution with Tom Carroll replacing Luke Amos.
Jason Tindall is making the team's second substitution at Vitality Stadium with Junior Stanislas replacing Jefferson Lerma.
In the minute 83, Chris Willock is replacing Ilias Chair for the away team.
The second-half is over. The match ends 0-0.
